serverSession

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier. This is a big ugly number and is generally not displayed.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
 
active  Help
This indicates if the session is currently active, or if it has expired.
  		boolean required
 
createdUtcTs  Help
The date and time when the session was created.
  		timestamp required
 
closedUtcTs  Help
The date and time when the session was closed.
  		timestamp  
lastTouchedUtcTs  Help
The date and time when the session was last touched. Used to support automatic timeouts.
  		timestamp required
 
version  Help
The application version. The server session is only valid if its version matches the application's current version. This is used to catch stale sessions when the application is upgraded.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion  
createdLocalTs  Help
The date and time when the session was created.
  		timestamp  
createdLocalTsMessage  Help
The date and time when the session was created.
  		text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
createdLocalDate  Help
The date and time when the session was created.
  		date  
createdLocalTime  Help
The date and time when the session was created.
  		time  
closedLocalTs  Help
The date and time when the session was closed.
  		timestamp  
closedLocalTsMessage  Help
The date and time when the session was closed.
  		text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
closedLocalDate  Help
The date and time when the session was closed.
  		date  
closedLocalTime  Help
The date and time when the session was closed.
  		time  
lastTouchedLocalTs  Help
The date and time when the session was last touched. Used to support automatic timeouts.
  		timestamp  
lastTouchedLocalTsMessage  Help
The date and time when the session was last touched. Used to support automatic timeouts.
  		text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
lastTouchedLocalDate  Help
The date and time when the session was last touched. Used to support automatic timeouts.
  		date  
lastTouchedLocalTime  Help
The date and time when the session was last touched. Used to support automatic timeouts.
  		time
